name: osurgame testing
description:
A Diablo-style after office project I'm working on in Unity. While playable, it still needs a lot of work. Most of the assets used are from the Unity asset store, and the sounds come from Zapsplat.com. This is still very much in the early stages of development so expect all kinds of shenanigans/bugs.

-Maps are randomly generated by connecting premade rooms, and filling them with enemies/content

-Enemies can be spawned as "Named" ennemies with modifiers

-Items/Magic items exist

-Several basic spells to toy with

-3 levels, about 15mins of playtime for a single run
